snippet.title: Guild of Dungeoneering Ultimate Edition announcement trailer
snippet.description:
The dungeon-building card battler is back! Guild of Dungeoneering Ultimate Edition is a completely rebuilt and remastered version of the award-winning 2015 indie hit from Gambrinous. 

Coming 2021! 

Join us on discord: https://discord.gg/gambrinous

In this turn-based dungeon crawler with a twist, instead of controlling the hero you build the dungeon around them. Using cards drawn from your guild decks you lay down rooms, monsters, traps and of course loot!
